name: Under Wing and Snow
description:
Synopsis Keep your babies safe on the mountain trail...

Play as a mother wyvern who stayed behind to wait for your babies to hatch. Now that they are ready for travel, make the journey down the mountain to rejoin your colony. But be wary of nightfall, when predators are waiting to pick off your little ones.

  • During the day, navigate through a maze-like path down the mountain that changes each time you attempt the trek.
  • At night, quickly deposit your babies in a shelter, then get ready to fight off the hordes of monsters with your talons and flame breath.

Game created for Fireside Jam 2022 with the theme "Protect." 

Controls:
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • X for slash attack, Z for fire breath
  • Space to interact (i.e. retrieve and place babies in shelters)
  • Placing babies in shelter protects them from any damage

Apologies in advance for any weird bugs!
